description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.en: The Software of Mechanical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）Matlab  and  toolkit 之使用
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid  design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 同步工程課程提供學生兩方面學習的主題：(1)建構同步產品與製程的方法與組織 (2)應用前法設計與發展出全生命產品整合系統。整個課程將涵蓋下列子題：(1)製造競爭力(2)全生命週期管理(3)在造工程(4)同步工作團隊(5)系統工程(6)資訊塑模(7)產品實現流程剖析等多項子
description.en: The course of Concurrent Engineering provides two major themes. The first theme is establishing a concurrent product and process methodology. The second theme is applying this methodology to design and develop the total product integrated system. In the following key topics are discussed in the whole semester: (1) manufacturing Competitiveness (2) life-cycle management (3) process reengineering (4) Concurrent work-groups (5) system engineering (6) information modeling (7) product realization process.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

notes: 不開放附讀,使用電算中心教室

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意半導體元件、整流電路，電晶體和電路，運算放大器、線性積體電路，邏輯元件，數位電路，數位積體電路，微處理器，放大器等。
description.en: Semiconductor Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, Logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc..

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程在導引學生了解教師專業的相關概念與理論，協助學生探究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，以及教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略。
description.en: This course is to guide students to understand the relevant concepts and theories on teacher professionals；to explore the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria；to investigate  the successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

name.en: Field Test Environment Management and Safety

description.zh: 探討技職學校實習工場規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等管理事項，以及實習工場安全防護設施與措施，以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: Exploring the best practice of management and safety for field test environment is the purpose of this course.

name.en: Instructional Strategies for Technical- Vocational Education

description.zh: 身為一名專業教師，應對教學策略有深刻的瞭解，方能詳細考慮各項條件﹑採取適切的教學策略，提昇教學的成效。本課程之開設，即在使學習者熟悉教學策略的意義﹑教學策略的類型，提昇教學相關理念，並進一步應用所學，反思個人的教學，促進教學理論與教學實踐間的連結。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 本課程內容以個體、團體與組織三層次為經，以行為基礎、激勵理論、個體決策、團體行為、團體決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題為緯，探討組織相關之理論及管理實務。
description.en: The curriculum discusses the theory and practice of organization management in terms of the horizontal development of the individual, group, and organization and the vertical development of the related issue on behavior foundation, encouragement theory, individual decision, group behavior, group decision, communication theory, leadership, power and politics, leadership, organization design, organization culture, organization change and development.

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 1.雙極性電晶體 2.蕭特基接面 3.MOS結構 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS電路及 製程   6.各種IC技術
description.en: 1.bipolar junction transfors 2.metal-semiconductor junctions 3.MOS structors 4.MOSFETS  5.CMOS circuits & processes 6.IC fabrication technologies

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機率基本觀念及數理隨機變數、工程常用的機率分佈函數、量測數據與參數估算、迴歸及相觀分析、可靠度之分析及運用、電腦模擬(蒙地卡羅)技術。
description.en: Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling Distribution, Maximum LikelihoodModel Fitting, Confidence Tolerance and Prediction intervals, Regression Analysis, Introduction to Monte Carlo Methods.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 以初學者為對象,基本理論與實際並重.從緒論,微生物之形態,分類與變異,微生物一般特性,微生物之發酵代謝,微生物催化劑等係簡介應用微生物之一般基礎概念.然後敘述釀造食品工業,微生物應用工業,微生物之遺傳與育種,微生物特殊機能之應用,培養工程學等,最後介述生物科技與化學工業之關係等.使讀者對各項微生物工業之應用技術,具有全般性概念.
description.en: This course introduces the general concepts of Bioscience and Biotechnique Especially, it aims on Applied Microbiology, such as the fundamental knowledge of the characteristics and classification, Mechanisms of fermentations, general biochemistry, the microbial biocatalysts, Fermented-foods, Applied Microbial Industries etc. In addition, it includes genetics, Special uses of Bionics, and describes the reaction between Biotechnology and Chemical Industries, among them, it cares with the protection of Environmental.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 邀請各界人士到系演講，針對學術專題研究成果進行研討，並就管理技術與發展趨勢以及成功個案等介紹不同行業的營運方式及競爭力分析。
description.en: Scholars and experts will be invited to make lectures; each lecture will focus on special attribution in the field which speaker involved.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

description.zh: 模矩配合是針對建築生產過程所制訂的共同尺度規則，以作為規畫設計製造之間資訊交流的工具，以及空間共用的各種建築系統之間定位協調的工具。本課程將由淺而深的從基本模矩概念，逐步介紹模矩配合的理論與操作方法，進而由國內外應用實例檢討模矩配合制度的發展與推動。課程內容包括： 模矩基本介紹 模矩配合理論 操作準則 應用實例
description.en: Modular Coordination is an agreed rule of dimension to smooth the process of building production. With this tool we can exchange data between parties of planning, design, and manufacture, as well as coordinate positions with building systems which sharing a space. We will study the basic theory, current applications and future trend of MC in this course. It contents Introduction of Module Theory of Modular Coordination Principles of conduction Cases of application.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (I)

description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程專為主修非生命科學領域的大專學生所設計，透過日常生活常見的現象，介紹生物學幾個主要學門領域的概念，使學習者能夠瞭解生物學知識在生活中的應用。課程以講解、簡易實驗操作、討論和分組報告進行，包括：細胞學、生物技術、人體構造功能、植物構造與功能、生態學。課程的重點在於生物相關訊息的蒐集、理解、資料整理、判讀，希望能夠建立學生接觸非主修領域知識的習慣，有更廣泛和自由的思維。
description.en: This course is designed for non life science major students. Through events usually occur in everyday life, we will explore the relationship between Biology and our daily life. The goal of the course is to create an environment which lets students contact with the field with which they are unfamiliar, and to understand it with interest. Course activities include : lectures, group discussion, simple experiments. The important topics of the course include : cell, biotechnology, human health, horticulture.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

name.en: An exploration of the place-names in Taiwan

description.zh: 「台灣」的名稱很可能是由「埋冤」或「埋完」的閩南語演變而來的（台灣的「灣」，本地人均唸第二聲，音如「完」或近「冤」，而不唸原字該唸的第一聲）。早期在台灣幾乎到處可見的「御使崎」地名，其實是緣自當時最普遍的運輸工具「牛車」而來的特殊景觀。  「地名」通常可顯示出當地地形、地物或地貌景觀的特徵。也可能代表了當地特殊的地理現象，更可能隱藏著台灣先民許多胼手胝足、可歌可泣的傳奇和拓荒血淚史。而幾個地名串連起來，也許就訴說了一條我們祖先從閩粵來台，由登陸、轉進、開發以至於定居的路線。  一個地方怎麼會以虐待動物的「打狗」、「打貓」為名？「貴子坑」為何有好多「鬼」故事？基隆為什麼原稱「雞籠」呢？沙鹿、初鹿、鹿草、鹿野、鹿谷、鹿港……等，這麼多地方以「鹿」為名，究竟那裡有鹿？那裡沒有鹿？如果沒有鹿，怎麼會以「鹿」為名呢？南投在南、北投在北，當然是天經地義的事，可是北港在南，南港卻在北，如何令人心服口服呢？台北、台南、台中、台東都有，為什麼獨缺「台西」縣市呢？  總之，台灣地名的來由，真是琳琅滿目、數之不盡，有知識性的，也有趣味性的；有文獻記載的，也有口耳相傳的，請讓我快快道來……。
description.en: The place-names in Taiwan not only tell us the forms of the land, and the superficies of the ground, but also reveals the special geographical phenomena, and much further, the hardship and legendary of our ancestors.The name "Taiwan" could be evolved from the slang - "bury the grievance" or "bury it all" in Taiwanese.  Some places have merciless names such as "thrash the dog", "thrash the cat".  What is the reason that Keelung was ever called "chicken cage"?  We can find many places were named with "deer" in Taiwan, but we cannot see any deer in some of these places today.  I believe that it will be very difficult to convince our people that BeiGang (north port) is in the South and NanGang (south port) is in the North！Altogether, the stories of the place-names in Taiwan are countless and in variety, some of them are knowledgeable, and some are amusing; there are also some from the literature, and some are from legend. The main idea of this course is to help us looking into how various

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會民主法治觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課擬從以下方向發展：１．中國歷代政治得失評析：一個治亂興亡的觀點。２．現階段政府所面對的政治、經濟、社會與文化等挑戰３．實際憲政制度之運作對台灣政治發展之影響。４．政治文化與政治社會化研究。５．立憲民主政府的主要類型比較。６．民主憲政與人權保障探源。７．政治參與－政府機關對人民的政治活動。８．民主國家國會結構比較研究。９．從總統委任直選到總統直選－理論與實際。10．現代政治中行政與立法的關係。11．司法正義與司法革新。12．政治發展與政治穩定。
description.en: This course is intended to help students understand the constitutional development of Taiwan, and the relation between tradition and modern period so as to establish democratic concepts in this multi-cultural society.  This course will study the basis of our Constitution, and explore the following items: 1. the Chinese political development 2. what the challenge our government is facing at the present time 3. the consequence and impact of Constitution operation 4. the political culture and political sociology 5. comparison among various constitutional governments 6. democratic systems and human rights 7. political participation--state vs civil society 8. comparisons of the congress of democratic countries 9. theory and practice of the Presidential election systems 10. relation between the executive Yuan and legislation  11. judicial justice and judical reform 12. political development and steadiness.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象，及現代表面分析技術與應用。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、電子組態、化學鍵結與表面形貌等訊息的材料表面分析技術。所要介紹的表面分析方法包括：真空技術、歐傑電子能譜法（AES）、X-光光電子能譜法(XPS)、二次離子質譜法(SIMS)、低能電子繞射法(LEED)、掃描式電子顯微術(SEM)、掃描式電子穿隧顯微術(STM)、原子力顯微術(AFM)、表面振動光譜法、及程式控溫脫附法(TPD)。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure, surface phenomena and various modern surface analysis techniques. The first part of the course focuses on the properties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction. The second part of the course introduces various surface analysis methods, including vacuum technology, Auger Electron Spectroscopy (AES), X-ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS), Secondary Ion Mass Spectroscopy (SIMS) Low Energy Electron Diffraction (LEED), Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM),

description.zh: 1.展頻通訊簡介2.展頻序列之產生3.展頻行動通訊4.展頻多重進階通訊5.展頻通訊之同步技術6.展頻多重進階網路之容量與涵蓋範圍
description.en: 1.Introduction to Spread-Spectrum Communications2.Pseudonoise Sequences Generation3.Spread-Spectrum Communication in Mobile Environments4.Spread-Spectrum Multiple-Access Communications5.Synchronization of Spread-Spectrum Systems6.Capacity and Coverage of Spread Spectrum Multiple Access Networks

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en: 1.The coverage of technology management. 2.Technology management model. 3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.4.The management of technology projects. 5.The management of technology marketing. 6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development.  We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study.(1) Economics of the global textile industry.(2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry.(3) The evolution of competitive strategies.(4) Countermeasures for industry.    Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service.    Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 本課程採專題方式研討，主要探討高科技行銷的相關議題，包括高科技產品發展模式、顧客需求與採購行為、行銷策略擬定、行銷團隊設計。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is to discuss some important topics of Ｈigh-Tech marketing:  High-Tech product development model, customer need and buying behavior, marketing strategy planning, and marketing team design.  The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in High-Tech marketing practice.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot.  The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics:1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications,2. robot motion ,analysis and control3.  robot end effectors4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspectionsafety, training ,maintenance, and quality

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。
description.en: Text, image, audio, video are common used to transmit information now. How to organize and represent these different kinds of data became an important issue. This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹各種植入體如暫時性維持生命等待器官捐贈之心肺輔助器(heart-lung assist devices)，或永久性置換如左心室輔助器(left ventricular assist devices)，或半永久性間歇使用者如人工腎臟(artificial kidney)等。在1950年之前，人工器官之發展仍在萌芽階段，如木製腳(wooden leg)、矯正用眼鏡(corrective glasses)、牙科植入材等，設計粗糙、不美觀、無想像力，輸血是唯一的活體器官移植。至1970年，人工器官迅速發展，開發出人工腎臟、心律調整器、心瓣膜、人工血管、心肺輔助器、人工血管、眼球晶狀體、等具巧思且設計複雜之人造器官。1980年後更開發出，薄膜肺臟(membrane lung)、可植入水晶體、指甲與肌腱、全人工關節、義耳、乳房重建材料等，擴大人工器官在臨床的使用範圍。心室輔助器與全人工心臟(total artificial heart)在最近十年，廣泛的在動物及臨床測試。處理潰濫與燒傷之人工皮膚(artificial skin)、各種生物感測器(sensory)、及性輔助器等，在1985年後也被積極的研發。最近處理人體訊息傳遞之中央及周圍神經系統(peripheral and central nervous system)或相關界面元件之訊息植入物(information prostheses)，也積極的被研究開發，如功能完全之眼及耳
description.en: In the class, the class will train the students with the basic concept of how to design a biomaterial to apply on the injured tissue without eliciting host response and enhance the tissue regeneration. The class is also intended to develop in the students a familiarity with the use of materials in medicine and dentistry and with some rational basis of these applications.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子製造程序（其中最主要者為積體電路之製造程序）。首先說明製造方法上之三個 主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。
description.en: An introduction to the semiconductor manufacturing process. Courses include diffusion, microlithography and deposition.

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal structures. Application examples are  introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

name.zh: 建築物耐震補強技術之探討
name.en: Technigue of Seismic Retrofit for Building

description.zh: 本課程將以建築設計、計畫的角度去探討、分析，地震中建築物實際破壞的狀況及原因。並對建築物耐震診斷之概念、方法及耐震補修、補強，設計原理、新工法（制震補強、隔震補強）等，做一詳細介紹與說明。
description.en: We try to study the real reason why the buildings were damaged by a earthquake,as far as architechural design is concerned. In addition,we clarify the coacepts and methods of techuique of seismic retrofit for building and provide the new techical soltions to seismic and vibration protection,such as vibration control and base isolation,etc.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計2. 電晶體電路分析與設計3. FET電路分析與設計4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償5. 功率放大器分析與設計6. 回授放大器分析與設計7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計8. 震盪器分析與設計9. 主動濾波器分析與設計

Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體Matlab作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Guidance for Vocational and Technical Schools’ Students

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討當代輔導理論、技職教育學生特質，以及各種重要之學生問題如生涯規劃、職業輔導等輔導的原理與方法。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the theories and practice of Counseling for vocational and technical school students. The contents conclude the principles of counseling, characters of students, and the various techniques of counseling.

description.zh: 以傳統與革新的觀點探究技職教育方案評鑑的理論與實務，包括專有名詞、評鑑的規劃、評鑑取向、評鑑標準、評鑑倫理、評鑑人員、資料蒐集分析與解釋的方法、評鑑結果的報告及後設評鑑等相關議題。
description.en: Exploring the program evaluation theory and practice from both traditional and innovative point of view on Technical-Vocational Education, including: design evaluation plans, evaluation ethics, evaluation standard, evaluator, design tools for collecting data, conduct observations and interviews, interpret data, write reports, provide assistance in communicating findings to various stakeholder groups, and metaevaluation.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其應用系統，內容涵蓋如下：一.冷凍工程原理及系統。二.食品冷凍工業。三.工業冷凍。四.超低溫冷凍系統與應用。五.冷凍運輸。六.特殊冷凍應用。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system application. The contents cover the following topics: 1) The principles and system application of refrigeration engineering, 2) Food refrigeration, 3) Industrial refrigeration, 4) Extra-Low-Temperature refrigeration system and application, 5) Transport refrigeration, 6) Special application of refrigeration.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括: (1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論 (5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include (1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity (2) Time-Temperature Correspondence (3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers (4) Rubber Elasticity (5) Viscoelastic Models (6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 能源概論，熱力學，非再生能源，再生能源的利用，能源的有效變換，未來能源的發展形態，有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。
description.en: General introduction, thermodynamics, non-renewable energy, use of renewable energy, energy conversion, future development, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, energy effectiveness, energy management.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project.
